title: How to view registers values in string
content:
Is it possible that radare2 will show registers values also in strings ?

For example, when I run ar I am getting the liste of registers and I have:  

```
rax = 0x000000042  

```
Is there a way to also show next to it the string value ?
Something like that:  

```
rax = 0x000000042   ; 'B'

```

answers_data.content: Using drr is showing the strings.
